abilities.name: Aegis
abilities.rules: Aegis Defense Ongoing  After determining a defense roll, you may put a special token on your equipped shield until the end of the round.  The shield cannot be used nor unequipped as long as it has the token, but you add Power equal to half the current initiative step (round up). During one defense roll this round (after rolling), you may add a Wear token to your equipped shield to add +3 Power.

abilities.name: Animal Tamer
abilities.rules: Animal Tamer Meta Ongoing  Place a raccoon minion within range 2. It has a speed of 5 and is Nimble, but can never be targeted or suffer damage. It can perform all special movement actions like heroes (but not interact with vessel tokens), and it can carry up to two items.  When this minion disappears, place a "Dropped Item" token on its position with the items it was carrying.  Any items held by the raccoon at the end of an adventure are carried over to the Town Phase. Move 3 (gain Nimble)

abilities.name: Animal Tamer

items.rules: Axe 1h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.  Add (Cursed Die) to melee defense. craftable

items.name: Balsamic Bandages
items.rules: Balsamic Bandages consumable mundane Consume to remove all your current scratches.

items.name: Band Of Teleportation
items.rules: Band Of Teleportation gear ring magical Spend one movement point and suffer one scratch to assume any new position on the game board.

items.name: Bandages
items.rules: Bandages consumable mundane Consume to heal half your current scratches (round up).

items.name: Baron Murkgrad's Mantle
items.rules: Baron Murkgrad's Mantle gear back Ignore the effects of Cursed.    Gain +1 speed.

items.name: Blade
items.rules: Blade 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Standard Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks. craftable

items.name: Blade Of Swiftness
items.rules: Blade Of Swiftness 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.  You may adjust your initiative by one step after revealing your ability cards.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Perform a free attack (max. 2 per round). Star: +1 Power.

items.name: Bladed Staff
items.rules: Bladed Staff 2h weapon melee blade polearm hand Gain Reach.  Add (Enhancement Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks and melee defense.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: Perform a free attack against an unwounded enemy (max 2. per round). Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Book Of Conjuring
items.rules: Book Of Conjuring gear magical Once per adventure, summon a demon minion with a toughness of 8 and a speed of 5. It adds (Power Die) (Enhancement Die) to its attacks.  It suffers a scratch after each of its turns.

items.name: Boots Of Speed
items.rules: Boots Of Speed gear boots magical Gain +1 speed.  At the beginning of each round, you may Move (1) (gain Slippery).

items.name: Bottomless Backpack
items.rules: Bottomless Backpack gear back magical At the beginning of each adventure, draw item cards until you found two consumable items.  You may keep those for free.  Additionally, as long as you have this item equipped as a Gear item you can carry three additional consumable items.

items.name: Bow
items.rules: Bow 2h weapon ranged bow hand Range 7.  Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks. craftable

items.name: Bow Of Lightning
items.rules: Bow Of Lightning 2h weapon ranged bow magical hand Range 7  Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may spend each (Surge) to add +1 Power OR to hit one additional target within range (deal max. 1 wound to those additional targets each).

items.name: Bow Of The Shaman
items.rules: Bow Of The Shaman 2h weapon ranged bow magical hand Range 6  Add (Enhancement Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks, and add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to spellcasting.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Reduce the cooldown of one of your spells by 2. Star: +1 Power. Surge: +2 Power.

items.name: Box Of Imports
items.rules: Box Of Imports consumable immediate Immediately draw 10 random item cards from the next available item tier (e.g., a party in the third chapter can look at 10 tier-4 items). You may purchase one of these items for the usual gold costs.

items.name: Brigandine
items.rules: Brigandine armor heavy Add (Enhancement Die) to defense.  You may use the below spending option on defense. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Broadhead Arrows
items.rules: Broadhead Arrows gear mundane If your ranged attacks with a bow or crossbow cause at least one wound, also cause Bleed (2).

items.name: Broken Staff
items.rules: Broken Staff 2h weapon melee polearm hand Add (Blessing Die) to spellcasting.

items.name: Brooch Of Soothing Winds
items.rules: Brooch Of Soothing Winds gear magical Once during your turn, you may spend 2 movement points to heal one scratch from an ally within range 2.

items.name: Buckler
items.rules: Buckler 1h weapon shield hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending option on defense. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Chainmail Coif
items.rules: Chainmail Coif gear helmet Ignore bonus attack modifiers that enemies get from abilities or AI cards.    You may use the below spending option on defense. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Chakram Of Solstice
items.rules: Chakram Of Solstice 1h weapon melee/ranged blade hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.  If you are not adjacent to an ally, add another (Enhancement Die).    May be used as a ranged weapon with a range of 4.  You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: Perform a free attack (max. 2 per round).

items.name: Circlet Of The Marksman
items.rules: Circlet Of The Marksman gear helmet If you perform a ranged attack and your target is in a straight or diagonal line to you, add an automatic (Surge) to your roll.

items.name: Claws of Ebberesk
items.rules: Claws of Ebberesk 2h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Enhancement Die) to your attacks.  Your attacks are still considered 'unarmed' and as if you had your hands free.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Cause Bleed (2).

items.name: Combat Gloves
items.rules: Combat Gloves gear gloves Add (Blessing Die) to unarmed attacks and to melee defense.

items.name: Combat Wand
items.rules: Combat Wand 1h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to spellcasting. Add (Blessing Die) to attacks. You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: Cause Dazed

items.name: Composite War Bow
items.rules: Composite War Bow 2h weapon ranged bow hand Range 6  Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Cause Knockback (3). Star: Cause Weaken. DoubleSurge: +2 Power.

items.name: Crystallized Thistle
items.rules: Crystallized Thistle gear magical You may suffer a scratch to re-roll one of your spellcasting dice.  Can be done multiple times.

items.name: Dabbler's Band
items.rules: Dabbler's Band gear ring magical Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to spellcasting if you don't get any other spellcasting bonus dice from items.

items.name: Dagger
items.rules: Dagger 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Standard Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks. Surge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 3 to 5.

items.name: Decorated Cape
items.rules: Decorated Cape gear mundane Counts as equipped if it is in the backpack.    While equipped, you obtain a third 'Gear' item slot (put the 'Gear' item on top of this card).

items.name: Divine Essence
items.rules: Divine Essence consumable witchcraft Consume to reduce the cooldowns of all abilities (yours and allies) by 2.

items.name: Dreamdust
items.rules: Dreamdust consumable witchcraft You may consume this at any time to prevent an event from happening.    Unlike other consumables, you don't need to spend 1 movement point to use it.

items.name: Dress Of Seduction
items.rules: Dress Of Seduction armor light Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Surge: Cause Weaken or Stun against the attacker. Surge: Move the attacker by 4 squares. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Druid's Shillelagh
items.rules: Druid's Shillelagh 2h weapon melee polearm hand Add (Enhancement Die) to spellcasting. Add another (Blessing Die) for each active ongoing spell that you have cast.  You may use the below spending options on spellcasting. Star: Ignore one botched result. Star: Extend the duration of one of your active ongoing spells by 1.

items.name: Duelist's Medallion
items.rules: Duelist's Medallion gear necklace magical If you are adjacent to a single enemy, but not to any other allies or enemies, add (Blessing Die) to your attacks and defense rolls.

items.name: Elegant Dagger
items.rules: Elegant Dagger 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks. DoubleSurge: Move (3) (gain Nimble) DoubleSurge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

items.name: Embershard Scepter
items.rules: Embershard Scepter 1h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Enhancement Die) to spellcasting and melee attacks.    You may use the below spending options on spellcasting and attacks. DoubleSurge: +4 Power, but this item suffers Wear. DoubleSurge: +1 Power.

items.name: Energizing Concoction
items.rules: Energizing Concoction consumable potion Consume to reduce all your cooldowns by 1.

items.name: Ensorcelled Signet Ring
items.rules: Ensorcelled Signet Ring gear ring magical You can spend (Double Surge) on any attack, defense or spellcasting roll to reduce one of your cooldowns by 1.

items.name: Enthralled Vessel
items.rules: Enthralled Vessel consumable immediate One player may take over a vessel of their choice (mythical vessels not allowed).

items.name: Exotic Cuirass
items.rules: Exotic Cuirass armor medium Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.  You may use the below spending options on defense. Surge: +1 Power. Surge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Fairnwood Staff
items.rules: Fairnwood Staff 2h weapon melee polearm hand You may add (Power Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to spellcasting, but increase the cooldown of the spell by 1 (for ongoing spells: reduce their duration by 1).    You may use the below spending options on spellcasting. Star: Ignore the above drawback.

items.name: Falchion Of The Seven Winds
items.rules: Falchion Of The Seven Winds 1h weapon melee blade magical hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    Attacks with this weapon automatically hit an enemy on a square behind the original target (adjacent but further away). Surge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

items.name: Fiery Claymore
items.rules: Fiery Claymore 2h weapon melee blade magical hand Add (Power Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: +3 Power. Star: Immediately damage the enemy again using only (Power Die). Surge: +2 Power.

items.name: Flail
items.rules: Flail 1h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks.  You may use the below spending option on attacks. Star: Hit one additional enemy adjacent to your target. Star: Treat the target's defense to be 1 lower (min. 1).

items.name: Glaive
items.rules: Glaive 2h weapon melee polearm slashing hand Gain Reach.  Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Hit one additional enemy within reach (deal max. 1 wound). Surge: Cause Weaken. Surge: +2 Power.

items.name: Golden Hawk
items.rules: Golden Hawk 2h weapon ranged crossbow hand Range 6  Add (Power Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Cause Cripple. Star: Cause Knockback (1). Surge: Cause Knockback (2).

items.name: Greatsword
items.rules: Greatsword 2h weapon melee blade hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks. craftable

items.name: Halberd
items.rules: Halberd 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain Reach.  Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Provide an adjacent ally with (Blessing Die) to their next attack this round. Surge: +1 Power and move the enemy by 1 square. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Hammer Of Justice
items.rules: Hammer Of Justice 1h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. On the damage rolls from Knockback, treat each (Surge) as +2 Power. Star: Cause Knockback (5). Star: Cause Knockback (2).

items.name: Hand Crossbow
items.rules: Hand Crossbow 1h weapon ranged crossbow hand Range 5  Add (Blessing Die) to attacks, and another (Blessing Die) against targets within range 3.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Ignore the negative power rolled from all (Cursed Die). Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Hardened Leather Cuirass
items.rules: Hardened Leather Cuirass armor medium Add (Standard Die) (Enhancement Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Surge: Gain +2 Power for your next attack against that enemy. Does not stack.

items.name: Healing Potion
items.rules: Healing Potion consumable potion Consume to heal one wound from yourself.

items.name: Heart Of Gazhuatl
items.rules: Heart Of Gazhuatl consumable witchcraft Ignore the effects of Cripple and Bleed as long as you have this in your inventory.    If your vessel would die, you may consume this (without having to spend movement points) to prevent its death, restoring all wounds except one.

items.name: Heavy Armor
items.rules: Heavy Armor armor heavy Add (Enhancement Die) to defense. craftable

items.name: Heavy Crossbow
items.rules: Heavy Crossbow 2h weapon ranged crossbow hand Range 7  Add (Power Die) to the first attack each round with this weapon.  You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: +3 Power.

items.name: Hidden Dagger
items.rules: Hidden Dagger 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.  Once per adventure, at any time, you can equip this item without spending movement points and then perform a free attack, adding another (Power Die).  You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

items.name: Horned Mace
items.rules: Horned Mace 1h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.  Causes Dazed when dealing at least 2 wounds at once.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Cause Stun. Star: +4 Power.

items.name: Hzasdin Bloodline Amulet
items.rules: Hzasdin Bloodline Amulet gear necklace magical At the end of your turn, you can play a card from your hand (as major or minor action), but you have to put another, random hand card on cooldown 5 when doing so.

items.name: Imperial Armor
items.rules: Imperial Armor armor light Add (Blessing Die) to defense.  Re-roll up to one die on each of your attack, spellcasting or defense rolls.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Improvised Shield
items.rules: Improvised Shield 1h weapon melee shield hand Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending option on defense. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Infinite Breadcrumbs
items.rules: Infinite Breadcrumbs gear witchcraft Once per adventure, you may either determine the layout of a just discovered room (instead of rolling for it) or heal a wound from yourself.

items.name: Katana
items.rules: Katana 2h weapon melee blade hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks and melee defense.    You may use the below spending option on attacks and defense. Star: Treat this result like a critical. Star: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: +1 Power.

items.rules: Kindlespark Potion consumable potion Consume to regenerate a wound.    When used, the potion refills itself at the end of the adventure.

items.name: Kite Shield
items.rules: Kite Shield 1h weapon shield hand Add (Enhancement Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Star: +2 Power. Star: +1 Power. DoubleSurge: After defending, cause Knockback (2) against the attacker.

items.name: Knight's Pauldrons
items.rules: Knight's Pauldrons gear shoulder Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may prevent 2 scratches by assigning wear to this item.

items.name: Kris Of Leeching
items.rules: Kris Of Leeching 1h weapon melee blade magical hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Heal a scratch from yourself or an ally within range 3. Star: Deal a wound. Surge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

items.name: Laraksian Tea
items.rules: Laraksian Tea consumable potion Consume to heal one scratch from yourself, then turn this item face down.    This item refills itself as soon as you defeat an enemy (deliver the final blow), in which case you turn it face up again.

items.name: Leather Rags
items.rules: Leather Rags armor light At the beginning of each round, you may extend the duration of one of your ongoing effects by 1. This may not affect a spell card.

items.name: Leyforest Cloak
items.rules: Leyforest Cloak gear back magical Add (Blessing Die) to attacks, defense and spellcasting.    You may use the below spending options on any roll. DoubleSurge: Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1.

items.name: Leyforest Greaves
items.rules: Leyforest Greaves gear boots magical Gain +2 speed.    Gain +1 toughness on all rows.

items.name: Light Armor
items.rules: Light Armor armor light Once per round: Add (Power Die) to one of your attack or spellcasting rolls. craftable

items.name: Light Merchant's Crossbow
items.rules: Light Merchant's Crossbow 1h weapon ranged crossbow hand Range 4  Add (Standard Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.  You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: +2 Power and cause Weaken. Star: +3 Power if this is the first attack with this weapon this round.

items.name: Longbow
items.rules: Longbow 2h weapon ranged bow hand Range 8  Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Deal one wound. Star: Cause Cripple. DoubleSurge: +1 Power.

items.name: Longsword
items.rules: Longsword 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Standard Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks. DoubleSurge: Move 2 (gain Slippery). DoubleSurge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

items.name: Mage Blade
items.rules: Mage Blade 1h weapon melee blade magical hand Add (Blessing Die) to spellcasting and (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to melee attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks and spellcasting. Star: (Melee only:) Play a spell from your hand (max. once per round). Star: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: +1 Power.

items.name: Mage Order Robes
items.rules: Mage Order Robes armor light magical Add (Enhancement Die) to spellcasting.    You may use the below spending options on defense and spellcasting. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Maul
items.rules: Maul 2h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks. craftable

items.name: Medium Armor
items.rules: Medium Armor armor medium Ignore the first scratch of each round. craftable

items.name: Mercenary Contract
items.rules: Mercenary Contract gear mundane Start each adventure with a Mercenary minion who has a toughness of 6 and a speed of 4.  Increase their toughness by +2 for each campaign chapter that has been completed.    Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to the Mercenary's attacks as long as you have this contract equipped.

items.name: Mirror Of Envy
items.rules: Mirror Of Envy gear witchcraft During any town phase, you may declare an item that you or an ally owns.  From that point onwards, the 'Mirror Of Envy' mimicks that item and works exactly like the copied item.

items.name: Mithril Chainmail
items.rules: Mithril Chainmail armor medium Add (Power Die) to defense.  Gain +2 speed.  Add (Cursed Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: +2 Power.

items.name: Necklace Of Binding
items.rules: Necklace Of Binding gear necklace magical At the beginning of each adventure, declare an armor or weapon that you own.    While the 'Necklace Of Binding' is equipped, the declared item ignores all wear and gains the below spending option. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Necklace of War
items.rules: Necklace of War gear necklace magical Add the below spending options to attacks. Star: Cooldown -2. Star: Cause Knockback (1). Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Novice Robes
items.rules: Novice Robes armor light magical Add (Blessing Die) to spellcasting.    You may use the below spending option on defense. Surge: +1 Power, but the armor suffers one 'Wear' token.

items.name: Orb Of Refreshment
items.rules: Orb Of Refreshment gear witchcraft You may spend 2 movement points to put one token on this item (max. 5).  At any time, once per round, you may spend 3 such tokens to end the cooldown of any one's ability card.

items.name: Peasant's Garment
items.rules: Peasant's Garment armor light Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending option on defense. Surge: +1 Power, but the armor suffers one 'Wear' token.

items.name: Pitchfork
items.rules: Pitchfork 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain Reach.  Add (Standard Die) to your attacks.  You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Add (Blessing Die) to your next defense this round. Surge: +3 Power.

items.name: Polearm
items.rules: Polearm 2h weapon melee polearm hand Reach.  Add (Standard Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks. craftable

items.name: Potent Healing Potion
items.rules: Potent Healing Potion consumable potion Consume to heal two wounds from yourself.

items.name: Power Cube
items.rules: Power Cube gear magical At the end of your turn, reduce one of your cooldowns by 1.

items.name: Primitive Bow
items.rules: Primitive Bow 2h weapon ranged bow hand Range 4  Add (Blessing Die) to attacks. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Purifying Elixir
items.rules: Purifying Elixir consumable potion Consume to end up to two of your ongoing negative effects.

items.name: Quarterstaff
items.rules: Quarterstaff 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain Reach.  Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to spellcasting and attacks.  You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: +1 Power and move the enemy by 1 square.

items.name: Quiver
items.rules: Quiver gear back Add (Blessing Die) to ranged attacks with bows or crossbows.    You may use the below spending options on ranged attacks. Surge: Cooldown -1.

items.name: Reaper's Axe
items.rules: Reaper's Axe 1h weapon melee slashing magical hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.  Add (Cursed Die) to melee defense.(red##)    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: +2 Power. Star: Hit one additional enemy within reach. DoubleSurge: Heal one scratch from yourself.

items.name: Repeating Crossbow
items.rules: Repeating Crossbow 2h weapon ranged crossbow hand Range 6  Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.  Perform a free ranged attack at the end of your turn.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: +2 Power. Star: +1 Power.

items.name: Retrain
items.rules: Retrain consumable immediate Replace the default (Surge) spending option of your vessel with another one of your choice (from the bag of "Alternative Spending Option")    OR    Change the learned perks of your vessel.

items.name: Ring Of Invulnerability
items.rules: Ring Of Invulnerability gear ring magical At the beginning of a round, you may activate this item, but only once per adventure.    You may then ignore any incoming scratches, wounds and negative effects during that round.

items.name: Ring Of Regeneration
items.rules: Ring Of Regeneration gear ring magical If you have an initiative of 2 or less, regenerate one scratch at the beginning of your turn.

items.name: Robe of the Mender
items.rules: Robe of the Mender armor light Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    Whenever you perform the major action of a 'meta' type card, heal one scratch from an ally within range 2.

items.name: Round Shield
items.rules: Round Shield 1h weapon shield hand Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Star: +1 Power. Star: +1 Power. DoubleSurge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Royal Plate Armor
items.rules: Royal Plate Armor armor heavy Add (Power Die) to defense.  Add (Cursed Die) to attacks.(red##)  Move (1) before or after performing a major action.    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: +1 Power.

items.name: Rune: Adamant
items.rules: Rune: Adamant rune armor Attach this to an armor.    Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

items.name: Rune: Astral Extension
items.rules: Rune: Astral Extension rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    When attacking, you may gain Reach and the 'Magical' tag, but add (Cursed Die) when doing so.  Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Drain
items.rules: Rune: Drain rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    When killing an enemy, heal one scratch from yourself.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Enchant
items.rules: Rune: Enchant rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    Convert a (Blessing Die) it adds into an (Enhancement Die).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Focus
items.rules: Rune: Focus rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    When attacking, you may spend one (Star) to reduce one of your cooldowns by 2.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Fortune
items.rules: Rune: Fortune rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    When attacking, you may convert one botch into (Star).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Fuel
items.rules: Rune: Fuel rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    When attacking, you may suffer 2 scratches to add (Power Die) (Blessing Die).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Hardening
items.rules: Rune: Hardening rune Attach thiss to a tier 3 item.  The item is considered to have +2 durability.  Can only attach one rune per item.

items.name: Rune: Holy
items.rules: Rune: Holy rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    When attacking, you may spend (Star) (Star) to heal 2 scratches from yourself. If you don't have any scratches, heal a wound instead.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Mark
items.rules: Rune: Mark rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    When attacking, you may spend (Star) to cause Weaken.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Protection
items.rules: Rune: Protection rune armor Attach this to an armor.    If the armor adds only one die or less to defense, add (Enhancement Die) to its defense.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

items.name: Rune: Rage
items.rules: Rune: Rage rune armor Attach this to an armor.    You may set aside a (Star) from a defense roll and add it to your next attack.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

items.name: Rune: Stoic
items.rules: Rune: Stoic rune armor Attach this to an armor.    You may spend (Surge) on defense to reduce the duration of a negative effect on you by 1.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

items.name: Rune: Void
items.rules: Rune: Void rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon (including Soul Shop items).    When attacking, count up to one rolled blank as (Surge) instead.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Sacred Bead
items.rules: Sacred Bead consumable witchcraft Consume to grant yourself and all allies +2 power to all defense rolls for this round.

items.name: Scalemail Suit
items.rules: Scalemail Suit armor heavy Add (Power Die) to defense.  Add (Cursed Die) to attacks.(red##)    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: +1 Power.

items.name: Scroll Of Resurrection
items.rules: Scroll Of Resurrection consumable immediate Immediately get a vessel back that died during your last adventure. The original player who had it regains the perks that were already unlocked.

items.name: Scroll of the Ancients
items.rules: Scroll of the Ancients gear magical Once per adventure, by spending two movement points, you may cast any one spell (that exists in the game).  It automatically succeeds without any spendings.

items.name: Scythe
items.rules: Scythe 2h weapon melee polearm slashing hand Gain Reach.    Add (Blessing Die)    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Hit one additional enemy within reach (deal max. 1 wound). Surge: Hit one additional enemy within reach (deal max. 1 wound).

items.name: Sell Soul Shard
items.rules: Sell Soul Shard consumable immediate Immediately obtain 20 gold coins.

items.name: Shield
items.rules: Shield 1h weapon shield hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to defense. craftable

items.name: Shield Of Reckoning
items.rules: Shield Of Reckoning 1h weapon shield hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Star: Perform a free melee attack against the attacker. Star: +1 Power. Surge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Shield Of The Bulwark
items.rules: Shield Of The Bulwark 1h weapon shield hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: After determining the result, prevent one scratch. DoubleSurge: +3 Power, but the shield suffers one 'Wear' token. Surge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Shield Of The Templar
items.rules: Shield Of The Templar 1h weapon shield hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to defense and spellcasting.    Add the below spending options to defense. DoubleSurge: +3 Power. DoubleSurge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Shiv
items.rules: Shiv 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Blessing Die) to attacks. Surge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

items.name: Short Bow
items.rules: Short Bow 2h weapon ranged bow hand Range 5  Add (Standard Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Perform a free attack (max. 2 per round). Star: +1 Power.

items.name: Short Sword
items.rules: Short Sword 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks.  You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

items.name: Slate Of Fate
items.rules: Slate Of Fate consumable immediate You may play one additional adventure (to a max. of 4 per tier) in the current tier or any of the previous ones.  Alternatively, you may re-attempt an adventure that your party has failed before - such an attempt also counts as a 4th adventure on the current tier.

items.name: Sledgehammer
items.rules: Sledgehammer 2h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks. Surge: Deal one wound.

items.name: Sorcerer's Focus
items.rules: Sorcerer's Focus gear necklace magical You may use the below spending options on spellcasting. Star: Reduce the cooldown of the spell by 1. Star: Reduce the target number to succeed at the spell by 1.

items.name: Soul Infusion
items.rules: Soul Infusion consumable immediate Immediately gain +1 XP for one player's soul to buy or upgrade ability cards.

items.name: Spear
items.rules: Spear 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain Reach.  Add (Standard Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks.  You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: +1 Power. Surge: +2 Power.

items.name: Spell Focus Staff
items.rules: Spell Focus Staff 1h weapon melee polearm hand Add (Surge) to each of your spellcasting rolls.    At the beginning of each adventure, declare a spell of yours. Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) when attempting that spell.

items.name: Spiked Mace
items.rules: Spiked Mace 1h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.  Add (Cursed Die) to defense against melee attacks.(red##)    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Cause Knockback (2). Surge: Cause Dazed.

items.name: Staff
items.rules: Staff 2h weapon melee polearm hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die)  to spellcasting. craftable

items.name: Staff Of Telekinesis
items.rules: Staff Of Telekinesis 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain Reach.  Add (Power Die) to spellcasting and attacks.    Whenever you have played the minor or major action of a spell card, move any one model by 1 square.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: +3 Power and move the enemy by 1 square.

items.name: Studded Tunic
items.rules: Studded Tunic armor medium Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to a single defense roll each round (decide before rolling).    You may use the below spending options on defense. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Sword Of Flowing Water
items.rules: Sword Of Flowing Water 1h weapon melee blade magical hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Move (3) (gain Slippery) after the attack. Star: Move (1) (gain Slippery) after the attack. Surge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

items.name: Sword of the Executioner
items.rules: Sword of the Executioner 2h weapon melee blade hand Add (Power Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Deal a wound. Star: +4 Power (if the enemy has taken at least 50% of its max. wounds). Surge: +2 Power.

items.name: Talisman
items.rules: Talisman consumable witchcraft Consume to end one of your ongoing effects.

items.name: Temporal Signet
items.rules: Temporal Signet gear ring magical Once per round, at the beginning of your turn, you may exchange one of your chosen abilities for this round with another one from your hand.

items.name: The All-Penetrating Eye
items.rules: The All-Penetrating Eye gear magical You may ignore the requirement of line-of-sight while casting a spell (range must still be fulfilled), but add (Cursed Die) to the roll.

items.name: The Tactician's Ring
items.rules: The Tactician's Ring gear ring If you perform at least two minor actions during a round, you may immediately allow an ally to play a major action from their hand.

items.name: Thief's Blade
items.rules: Thief's Blade 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    At the end of your turn, you may Move (3) (gain Nimble) in a straight or diagonal line and perform a free attack against one enemy that was within reach on that path.  You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: -2 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 5.

items.name: Throwing Knife
items.rules: Throwing Knife 1h weapon ranged throwing hand Range 5.  Add (Blessing Die) to attacks. craftable

items.name: Throwing Knives
items.rules: Throwing Knives 1h weapon ranged throwing hand Range 3  Doesn't have to be equipped to be used.    Add (Blessing Die) to attacks (if in backpack).  Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks (if in hand).

items.name: Tinkerer's Toolkit
items.rules: Tinkerer's Toolkit consumable mundane Consume to remove one 'Wear' token from an item that you carry.

items.name: Tome Of Demons
items.rules: Tome Of Demons gear magical Your summoned minions gain +1 Power on all their attacks.

items.name: Vessel Core
items.rules: Vessel Core consumable immediate Immediately unlock a perk of one hero's vessel, regardless of its Legend Point costs.  This cannot be applied to a column that already has one perk unlocked.

items.name: Volcano-tempered Helmet
items.rules: Volcano-tempered Helmet gear helmet You may prevent a wound by discarding this item.    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: +2 Power.

items.name: Wand
items.rules: Wand 1h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks and spellcasting. craftable

items.name: War Axe
items.rules: War Axe 1h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.    Add (Cursed Die) (Cursed Die) to defense against melee attacks.(red##)  You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Hit one additional enemy within reach (deal max. 1 wound).

items.name: Wardancer's Spear
items.rules: Wardancer's Spear 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain Reach.  Add (Power Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Add (Blessing Die) to your next defense this round. Surge: Cause Weaken. Surge: +2 Power.

items.name: Warhammer
items.rules: Warhammer 2h weapon melee crushing hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Cause Stun. Star: Cause Dazed.

items.name: Weapon Oil
items.rules: Weapon Oil consumable mundane Consume to remove up to two 'Wear' tokens from an item that you carry.

items.name: Whip Of The Succubus
items.rules: Whip Of The Succubus 1h weapon melee crushing hand Gain Reach.  Add (Enhancement Die) to your attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: Cause Dazed. Surge: Cause Stun.

items.name: Whistleheart Axe
items.rules: Whistleheart Axe 2h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.    Before rolling for an attack, you may add any amount of dice, but suffer 4 scratches in return.

items.name: Zweihaender
items.rules: Zweihaender 2h weapon melee blade hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks and melee defense.    You may use the below spending option on attacks and defense. Surge: +1 Power. Surge: -1 Cooldown for one of your cards at cooldown 4 or 5.

vessels.name: Amazon
vessels.rules: Amazon Move an enemy within range 2 by 1 square Tribal Fury When fighting with a weapon that grants Reach, you may spend (Surge) on your attacks to cause Knockback (2) or Dazed. Thrusting March When fighting with a weapon that grants Reach, add +1 Power for each two squares moved from the last movement action before the attack. Maintain Distance After defending, you may Move (2) (gain Slippery).  Additionally, add (Blessing Die) to your defense for each enemy within melee reach after the first. Murder Streak Once per round, after killing an enemy, you may immediately Move (2) and perform a free attack. Bola Throw Once during your turn, you may cause Cripple and Bleed (2) against an enemy within range 5.

vessels.name: Archer
vessels.rules: Archer Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Marksman Increase the range of your ranged attacks by +2 squares. Clear Shot Add +1 power to your attacks if the enemy is at least 5 squares away. Disciplined Aim Do not suffer a penalty when using a ranged weapon while being adjacent to an enemy. Ballistics Add (Blessing Die) to your ranged attacks with bows or crossbows. Resourceful When performing a ranged attack: You may spend (Star) to reduce the cooldown of that card by 2.

vessels.name: Artificer
vessels.rules: Artificer Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Conjure Focus Construct Once during your turn, you may place 'Focus' minion within range 5 that has 0 toughness and speed, up to a maximum of 3 minions.  A hero adjacent to a 'Focus' can remove it to add (Enhancement Die) to any one roll. Hastened Weaving You may suffer a scratch to place a second 'Focus' during the same turn.  Additionally, increase the maximum of active 'Focus' minions to 5. Mind Over Matter You can use movement points to move your 'Focus' minions instead of yourself.  Additionally, your 'Focus' minions gain a toughness of 1 and add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to their defense. Discharge Your 'Focus' minions can perform ranged attacks with a range of 5, instead of being limited to melee attacks.  They add (Blessing Die) to their attacks in either case. Helpful Construction Heroes who use a 'Focus' minion to add (Enhancement Die) to their roll also add an automatic (Surge).

vessels.name: Assassin
vessels.rules: Assassin Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Dirty Tricks If you attack an enemy that has an ally on the opposing square, add +1 power. Living Shadow Passively gain Slippery and Nimble. Death Spiral If you attack an enemy who has one or more wounds, add (Enhancement Die) to your attacks. Sudden Dagger If you break a weapon, you may immediately obtain a 'Dagger'.    Additionally, add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) when attacking with 'Dagger'. Perfection Treat botches as if you rolled a (Surge) instead.

vessels.name: Bard
vessels.rules: Bard Move an ally by 1 square  (grant Slippery) Motivation Once during your turn, you may move an ally by up to 2 squares. Lucky Dodge Once per round, if you would get attacked, you may instead put a hand card on cooldown 5 to negate the attack. Refreshing Tunes Whenever you play a major action with a base cooldown of 4 or higher, you may heal a scratch from an ally within range 5. Lasting Impression On any roll: You may spend (Star) to increase the duration of an ally's ongoing effect by 1. Mending Words On any roll: You may spend (Star) to decrease the duration of an ally's negative ongoing effect by 1.

vessels.name: Blade Dancer
vessels.rules: Blade Dancer Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Wall Of Steel If you wield two melee weapons and just performed an attack:  Once per round, perform a free attack with your equipped weapon in the other hand. Dance Of Blades Passively gain Slippery, and add (Blessing Die) to attacks with blade weapons. Death From The Left With every melee attack you can spend (Surge) to add +1 power and cause Knockback (2). Battle Maneuvers After each melee attack, you may Move (3) (gain Nimble). Deadly Rhythm You can perform your free off-hand attack (from 'Wall Of Steel') up two twice per round.

vessels.name: Cleric Of Tajuun
vessels.rules: Cleric Of Tajuun Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Combat Prayers At the end of your turn, you may put one hand card aside, face down - it counts as Divine Favor and you can have up to 3. You can spend one Divine Favor at any time to add (Enhancement Die) each to any one of your rolls - take that card back into your hand. Intensified Fervor Instead of granting yourself (Enhancement Die) to your rolls with "Combat Prayers", you can grant a (Power Die) by spending one additional Divine Favor.  Additionally, you can spend 2 Divine Favor to reduce one of your cooldowns by 4. Balance After causing at least one wound with a melee attack, you may spend 2 Divine Favor to heal a total of 2 scratches from allies within range 5. Deep Insight You may gain up to 2 Divine Favor per turn and your maximum Divine Favor increases to 4.  Additionally, at any time you can spend 4 Divine Favor to play a major action from your hand. Cleansing At any time you may spend 3 Divine Favor to remove all negative effects of yourself and all allies within range 3.

vessels.name: Commander
vessels.rules: Commander Move an ally by 1 square  (grant Slippery) Commanding Presence Once during your turn, you may do one of the following:  • Reduce an ally's cooldown by 1.  • Move an ally by 1 square.  • Grant an ally (Blessing Die) on their next roll this round. Defensive Order Once per round, you can provide an ally within range 4 with (Power Die) on their defense roll. Offensive Order Once per round, you can provide an ally within range 4 with an additional (Enhancement Die) on their attack roll. Get Ready! On any of your rolls: Spend (Star) to reduce one of the cooldowns of an ally by 2. Coordinate Once per round, at any time, you can provide an ally with an additional (Surge) on their roll (before dice get rolled).

vessels.name: Courtesan
vessels.rules: Courtesan Move an ally by 1 square  (grant Slippery) Comforting Words Once during your turn, heal a scratch from an ally within range 3 or reduce the duration of an ongoing effect on them by 1. Instill Passion You may treat any of your played minor actions as: "Increase the duration of any one ongoing effect (on yourself or an ally) by 1.", instead of what is written on the card. Surprising Stab Once per round, at any time, you may perform a free melee attack, but you add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) instead of what your weapons provide.  You may spend each (Surge) to add +1 power. Worth Dying For Once per round, you may redirect an attack targeted against you to an adjacent ally. They add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to their defense. Empathetic Fighting Whenever you perform a major action, you may reduce the cooldown of an ally's card by 1.

vessels.name: Dalheim the Lycan
vessels.rules: Dalheim the Lycan Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Werewolf Form At the beginning of a round, you may suffer a scratch to exchange your model with the Werewolf form (gain Bulky). You get (Power Die) on unarmed attacks and are considered to be unarmed. Lasts for that round. Bestial Claws While in Werewolf Form, unarmed attacks that cause at least one wound also cause Bleed (2) and Weaken. Natural Regeneration If you don't use 'Werewolf Form' at the beginning of a round, heal 2 scratches from yourself instead. Frenzy While in Werewolf Form, gain Slippery and perform a free melee attack at the end of your turn. Immortality If this vessel dies and you don't assume a new vessel in the meantime, it will be fully resurrected in town (with all unlocked perks still available).

vessels.name: Dhuvin The Strong
vessels.rules: Dhuvin The Strong Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Two Heads, One Body Bulky. You and Kilikor are considered to be one shared model and count as a single "ally" (only one of you benefits from any positive outcomes). If Dhuvin dies, Kilikor dies as well. By default, only you control this model's movement. Tough And Fast Reduce the attack value of all incoming enemy attacks by 1.  If you perform a minor action, the Kilikor player may perform a minor action from their hand (without cooldown reduction). Relentlessly Aggressive Increase your initiative by up to +2 each round.  If you perform a minor action, grant the Kilikor player (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to their next roll this round - this bonus can stack. Brother, What Now? At the end of your turns, shuffle your hand cards and give two random ones to the Kilikor player. They choose one which you may then perform immediately (either as minor or major), but you suffer a scratch in the process. Majestic Slap At the end of your turn, you may cause Knockback (6) against one adjacent enemy.  Additionally, Kilikor does not suffer a penalty when performing a ranged attack while being adjacent to an enemy.

vessels.name: Druid
vessels.rules: Druid Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Shapeshifter Once per round, you may play a "Wildshape" spell like an interrupt.  If you do this and override an already ongoing Wildshape spell, that spell goes back into your hand. Regenerating Form Whenever you successfully cast a "Wildshape" spell and change your shape, you regenerate one scratch. Nature Magic Whenever an ongoing spell of yours would end, you may immediately reset it back to its unmodified base duration, but you need to put a hand card on cooldown 4 in the process. Perfected Form Whenever you cast a "Wildshape" spell, you automatically add a (Surge) to your spellcasting roll. Druid Spit During your turn, you may spend one movement point and put a hand card on cooldown 5. Then you may heal half the current scratches of an adjacent ally (round up).

vessels.name: Dwarven Slayer
vessels.rules: Dwarven Slayer Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Grudge At the beginning of an adventure, declare one enemy type (not a boss). Your attacks automatically add +2 Power against that enemy type. Unshakeable Reduce the duration of all incoming negative effects against you by 1, to a minimum of 1. Trophy Hunter Whenever you kill at least one model of a group with traits, take one of the trait cards (once the group is defeated).  At the end of the adventure, obtain 20 coins for each card collected, up to a maximum of 60 coins. Honed Fighting Style When attacking or defending, treat the results from (Cursed Die) as positive power instead. Relieving Violence Whenever you kill an enemy, heal one scratch from yourself.  If you don't have a scratch, heal a wound instead, but the current (new) bar will be filled with scratches.

vessels.name: Elven Ranger
vessels.rules: Elven Ranger Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Survivalist At the end of your turn, if you don't have any wounds, regenerate one scratch or reduce the cooldown of one your cards by 1. Armed To The Teeth Consider the first weapon in your backpack to be equipped in addition to the weapons in your hand, but it must be of a different type (ranged vs. melee). It doesn‘t matter if it's a one- or two-handed weapon. You cannot use shields any longer. Arcane Archery Your ranged attacks can be aimed around one corner. You need Line-of-Sight to one spot and from that spot to the target (the total range must still match). Adaptive Fighting You may perform a ranged attack instead of any melee attack you would perform and vice-versa. Sniper Shot Gain +1 range with ranged attacks and if you attack an enemy who is at least 6 squares away, add (Blessing Die) and cause Weaken when causing at least one wound.

vessels.name: Half Giant
vessels.rules: Half Giant Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Giant Stature You are always considered Bulky, but cannot wear armor. Add (Power Die) to defense.  If you would get forcefully moved, you can prevent it by putting a hand card on cooldown 2. Iron Toughness Reduce the attack value of enemies by 1 before rolling for your defense. Reach All your melee attacks gain Reach.  Weapons that already grant Reach add (Blessing Die) to your attacks. Hard To Kill Whenever you would suffer a wound, roll (Blessing Die). If it shows a number or (Star), ignore the wound (but keep the current bar at full scratches). Brutish Strength On your melee attacks, you may spend (Surge) to cause Knockback (3), Stun OR  Dazed (only one of these spending options per attack).

vessels.name: Hunter
vessels.rules: Hunter Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Companion Start each adventure with a Dog minion. It has a toughness of 6 and a speed of 4.   Add +2 to its toughness and +1 power to its attack rolls for each campaign chapter you have completed. Dog Commands Once per round, at any time, you can let your Dog perform one action (choose):  • Move (3) (grant Slippery & Nimble) and attack.  • Move (2) and grant an adjacent ally (Enhancement Die) on their next roll this round. Tag Team If you attack an enemy and your Dog is adjacent to it, add (Blessing Die) to your attacks. Your dog has the same advantage against enemies you are adjacent to. Veterinary If your Dog has been defeated, at the beginning of your turn, you can forfeit all your placed actions (take them back into your hand without any effect) to instead revive your Dog within range 2 of you - it comes back with 4 scratches. Hunt Down Once per round, after causing a wound with a ranged attack, you can immediately Move (6) and then perform a free melee attack.

vessels.name: Izelga The Half-Demon
vessels.rules: Izelga The Half-Demon Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Demonic Speed You can place up to three cards at the beginning of each round, but suffer Cursed (1) when doing so. Gifted Heritage Instead of suffering Cursed (1) with 'Demonic Speed', you may suffer Bleed (1) or Weaken (1) instead. Pounce Once during your turn (if you only placed two cards), you may assume a position adjacent to an enemy within range 3 and perform a free melee attack against them. Hot Temper Add +1 power to your attacks for each negative ongoing effect on you. Reactive Blood At the beginning of your turn, heal one scratch from yourself for each wound that you have.  Don't suffer (Cursed Die) from wounds.

vessels.name: Joana The Paladin
vessels.rules: Joana The Paladin Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Holy Steed Spend 1 movement point to get on or off your horse.  While mounted, gain Bulky and Slippery and add (Blessing Die) to defense. While not mounted, add (Enhancement Die) (Enhancement Die) to any non-damaging and non-summoning spell. Divine Light Instead of performing a major action, you may make a spellcasting (2+) roll. If successfull, heal a scratch from a hero within range 5, plus one scratch per (Surge) spent. Put the overridden card on cooldown 4. Smite Instead of performing a major action, you may make a spellcasting (2+) roll.  If successful, cause Dazed or Cripple against enemy within range 5, or both effects by spending (Surge).  Put the overridden card on cooldown 1. Charge While mounted, right before or after performing a melee attack, you may Move (3) in a straight or diagonal line. Combat Mount While mounted, at the end or beginning of your turn you may Move (3).  At the end of your turn, your horse performs an attack like a minion, adding (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die).

vessels.name: Kilikor The Wise
vessels.rules: Kilikor The Wise Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 The Smart One Once per round, at any time, you may allow Dhuvin to Move (2) (grant Slippery).    Whenever you would be targeted, Dhuvin gets targeted instead. Any scratches / wounds you'd suffer or heal, Dhuvin suffers / heals instead. Moment Of Respite Whenever the Dhuvin player performs a major action, reduce one of your cooldowns by 1. Will Of The Mind Once per round, if the Dhuvin player performs a major action, you may play the minor action of a spell from your hand (without cooldown reduction). Reliable Tag Team At the beginning of each round, you may give one of your hand cards to the Dhuvin player. They can use it as if it was theirs. Once used, it goes back into your hand (minor action) or lands on your cooldown / duration tracker (major action). Push Through At the end of your turns, if the Dhuvin player suffers from at least one negative ongoing effect, you may heal Dhuvin by one scratch or reduce one of your cooldowns by 1.

vessels.name: King
vessels.rules: King Move an enemy within range 2 by 1 square Legacy When obtaining this vessel, obtain any one weapon or armor of your choice of the current tier and up to +2 tiers (Soul Shop & Legendary items may not be selected).  That item never suffers wear as long as it remains with the king. Royal Blood If you get assigned scratches from 'Life Bond' (from heroes without a vessel), you may ignore these scratches.  Additionally, generate one Soul Shard whenever you finish an adventure. Retainer I Start each adventure with a bodyguard minion who has a toughness of 6 and 4 speed.  They add (Blessing Die) to their attacks. Tax Collector Whenever you finish an adventure as a King, gain 50 coins. Retainer II Start each adventure with an (additional) bodyguard minion as per 'Retainer I'.

vessels.name: Knight
vessels.rules: Knight Move an enemy within range 2 by 1 square Irrepressible Once per adventure, at any point during your turn, you may heal all scratches from yourself. Armor Mastery If you wear medium or heavy armor, you may spend (Surge) to add +1 Power to your defense. Counter Attack When defending, once per round: You may spend (Star) to perform a free melee attack against the attacker. Pull Together Ignore (Cursed Die) that you'd get for having wounds. Last Stand Add (Power Die) to your attacks if your party has a total of two wounds or least one ally is without a vessel.

vessels.name: Man-At-Arms
vessels.rules: Man-At-Arms Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Weapon Training If a die shows a botched result during an attack, you may re-roll it once. Quickswap You don't have to spend movement points to change your equipped weapons, therefore you can do it at any time. Heroic Opportunity Instead of re-rolling a botched result, you may treat it as a (Star) and immediately add (Blessing Die) to the roll. Edge Alignment If one of your weapons would suffer wear, roll (Blessing Die). If it shows a non-blank side, the weapon remains undamaged. A Tool For Every Job Once per adventure, you may do one of the following at any time:  • Take any one consumable from the Pile Of Items.  • Assume a position within range 6.

vessels.name: Martial Artist
vessels.rules: Martial Artist Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Momentum Add (Blessing Die) to unarmed attacks. Gain one Combo token (max. 6) after each performed melee attack, but lose half of them at the end of each round (round up). Flashy Parry At any time, you can spend 3 Combo tokens to Move (2) (gain Slippery) and add (Power Die) to your next defense this round. Furious Fist On your melee attacks you can spend 2 Combo tokens and (Surge) to add +2 Power and Dazed. My Palm Is My Blade At the beginning of an adventure, take any one-handed weapon of up to the current tier and set it aside for that adventure. You can use its spending options on your unarmed attacks by additionally spending 1 Combo each. Seven Gates Chakra You can spend 4 Combo tokens before performing a melee attack to add seven dice of your choice to the attack. Afterwards, reduce your maximum Combo points by 1 for the remainder of the adventure.

vessels.name: Monk
vessels.rules: Monk Move an ally by 1 square  (grant Slippery) Sermon Collect a Ki token at the beginning of each round (max. 6).  Up to twice during your turn, you can spend a Ki token to reduce the duration of an ongoing effect from yourself or an ally by 1. Divine Protection You may add one (Standard Die) or (Blessing Die) for each Ki token you spend on your defense. Secret Techniques During your turn, you may spend 3 Ki tokens to increase the duration of one of your ongoing effects by 2. Restoration During your turn, you may spend 5 Ki tokens to heal a wound from yourself or an adjacent ally. Combat Monk Whenever you deal at least one wound during your turn, you receive one additional Ki token.

vessels.name: Peasant
vessels.rules: Peasant Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Quick Recovery As long as you don't have any wounds, heal one scratch from yourself at the beginning of your turns. Unbending 'Quick Recovery' also works while having up to one wound. Militia Training Add (Blessing Die) when attacking with a polearm. Shake It Off At beginning of your turns, reduce the duration of one of your negative ongoing effects by 1. Mule You can carry up to two additional items in your backpack.

vessels.name: Priest
vessels.rules: Priest Move an ally by 1 square  (grant Slippery) Healing Prayers Whenever you use a major action that could heal at least one scratch or wound, heal one scratch from an ally within range 3. Miracle At any time, you may discard one of your hand cards for the remainder of this adventure to heal any one wound. Only once per adventure. Curry Favor At the beginning of a round (before picking cards), if you only have three hand cards or less, reduce the cooldown of all your cards by 1. Divine Intervention Once per adventure, you can prevent an event from happening. Life Link If you would take your last wound and lose this vessel, another hero may voluntarily take that wound instead.  You remain with a full row of scratches.

vessels.name: Samurai
vessels.rules: Samurai Move an enemy within range 2 by 1 square Bushido Cannot use shields. Whenever you defend, gain an honor token (max. 6). You may spend 4 honor tokens at any time to play a major action from your hand. Honorable Challenge You may spend 3 honor tokens to force an adjacent enemy to attack you instead of an ally. Retaliate Once you suffered a total of 3 or more scratches during a round, perform a free attack against all adjacent enemies, and cause Knockback (2) with it. Combat Meditation You may spend 2 movement points to generate 1 honor token. Standoff If you attack or defend against an enemy while not being adjacent to other enemies or allies, add (Enhancement Die) to those rolls.

vessels.name: Ser Wynhall
vessels.rules: Ser Wynhall Move an enemy within range 2 by 1 square Titan Grip You can wield up to one two-handed melee weapon in a single hand. Knight's Training While wearing heavy armor, you may spend (Surge) on your defense roll to ignore one 'Wear' result. Desperate Strikes Add +2 power to the attacks of major actions for each wound you are suffering from. Chivalry Once per round, at any time, you may Move (2) (gain Nimble) and then cause Knockback (2) against any one adjacent enemy. Shield Bash / Throw You can perform melee attacks with your shield within range 3.  Add (Power Die) to attacks with your shield.

vessels.name: Seraphim
vessels.rules: Seraphim Move an ally by 1 square  (grant Slippery) Blessed You may convert each (Blessing Die) into one (Enhancement Die) on any type of roll. Steel Defense As long as you wield two melee weapons (shields do not count), you may reroll each defense once, but you have to reroll all dice and keep the new result. Celestial Flight Once during your turn, you may put a hand card on cooldown 4 to immediately Move (6) (gain Nimble). Noble Sacrifice At any time, once per adventure, you may heal 3 scratches from every hero (including yourself). Swiftness Once per round, when playing a major action, you may also use the minor action of that card (in any order), but don't get the usual cooldown reduction from this.

vessels.name: Shaman
vessels.rules: Shaman Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Shamanistic Traditions When casting a "Totem" spell, you may spend (Surge) to add +2 Power to the roll. Ancestral Spirits During your turn, you may discard a spell for the remainder of the adventure to deal damage to an enemy within range 6 using (Power Die) (Power Die) (Power Die) (Standard Die) (Standard Die). Totem Mastery During your turn, you may spend 2 movement points to let a totem within range 5 assume a new position within range 5 of you. Spirit Bonding Whenever you kill an enemy, you may increase or decrease the duration of each of your ongoing spells by 1. Restoration Of The Elements At any time, you may discard a spell for the remainder of the adventure to heal 3 scratches from any one hero.  If you suffer a wound, take back a spell that you discarded for the adventure (even from 'Ancestral Spirits').

vessels.name: Shinobi
vessels.rules: Shinobi Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Wall Jump Once during your turn, if you are adjacent to the non-walkable edge of a map tile or a red solid line, you may assume a new position within range 3. School Of Mirrors Add 'Shadow Clone' (A) to your hand cards (does not affect your card purchase costs). It always succeeds automatically.    If you lose this vessel, that card is lost as well. School Of Shadows Add 'Stealth' (B) to your hand cards (does not affect your card purchase costs).    If you lose this vessel, that card is lost as well. Toxic Thread Add (Power Die) to your first attack each turn if that enemy has the same or lower initiative than you. Shinobi's Toolkit You may add (Power Die) (Power Die) (Blessing Die) to an attack by discarding a weapon from your backpack.

vessels.name: Summoner
vessels.rules: Summoner Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Conjuring Mastery When you cast a spell to summon a minion, add (Power Die) to spellcasting. Blood Magick You may suffer one scratch to add (Power Die) to spellcasting. Anchored Summons Your summoned minions add (Blessing Die) to their defense rolls.    Additionally they may spend each (Surge) to add +1 Power to defense. Blood Ritual Once per round, you may suffer a scratch to reduce one of your cooldowns by 2. Ferocious Summons Your summoned minions add (Blessing Die) to their attacks.    Add another (Blessing Die) if your passive spellcasting dice pool consists of at least five dice or at least one (Power Die).

vessels.name: The Weird Twins
vessels.rules: The Weird Twins Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Pair Treat both miniatures as if they are the same hero (you can perform actions from both positions). Spend 1 movement point to merge both miniatures as one at either location, or to split them off within range 1. While merged, add (Blessing Die) to all tests. Symbiosis While the twins are split, once per round, if you perform a minor action, the other twin performs the same minor action.    Additionally, moving one twin automatically allows to move the other twin for an equal amount. Gang Up If you attack an enemy and both twins are adjacent to it (while being split), add (Standard Die) and you may ignore botches and wear on that roll. Amped You may spend your (Surge) spending options up to twice per roll while the twins are merged. Together Forever After splitting or merging, you add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to your defense for the remainder of the round.  Additionally, you may increase your intiative by up to two steps each round.

vessels.name: Thief
vessels.rules: Thief Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Sleight Of Hand If you loot a treasure chest, draw three item cards and pick two.  Additionally, you don't have to spend movement points to trade items with adjacent heroes. Combat Dancer Passively gain Slippery and +1 speed. Acrobatics Passively gain Nimble and a free (Surge) on every defense roll. Alertness Once per round, if an enemy would get adjacent to you, you may immediately Move (4). Quick Wits Increase your initiative by up to +2 when determining it.  If you don't increase your initiative, gain (Blessing Die) on your first attack during that round.

vessels.name: Vampire
vessels.rules: Vampire Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Vampire's Kiss Once during your turn, you can deal an adjacent hero a scratch to gain a blood token (max. 6).  Spend two blood tokens on any type of roll to add (Power Die). Blood Potency Automatically gain one blood token at the beginning of each round. Vampiric Superiority You can spend two blood tokens to either add (Star) or (Double Surge) to any of your rolls. Bloodbath If you defeat an enemy (by delivering the final blow), you gain a blood token. Unholy Regeneration During your turn, you can spend four blood tokens to heal one wound or 3 scratches from yourself.

vessels.name: Vesselless Soul
vessels.rules: Vesselless Soul Heal a scratch of an ally in range 5  (max. once per round) Life Bond & Incorporeal At the beginning of each round, roll (Cursed Die) (Cursed Die) (Cursed Die). Deal the highest die-result as scratches to two heroes of your choice each.    You still act as usual, but gain Nimble, cannot open doors / treasure chests and fully get ignored as a viable enemy target.

vessels.name: Warden
vessels.rules: Warden Move an enemy within range 2 by 1 square Vanguard Once per round, do one of the following:  • If an adjacent ally gets attacked, redirect the attack onto yourself.  • Add (Enhancement Die) to your melee attack with a 2h weapon. Combat Formation Once per round, at any time, you may Move (2).  Declare an ally within range 2 at the beginning of each round. You and that ally add (Blessing Die) to your defense rolls during that round Enter The Fray Once per round, if you end your movement adjacent to an ally, you and that ally may perform a free attack each, adding (Cursed Die). Wallop If you attack an enemy that has another ally adjacent to it, you can spend (Surge) to add +1 Power and either cause Dazed or Knockback (2). Weapon Mastery At the beginning of each round, if you wield a 2h melee weapon, you may declare one spending option of a 2h melee weapon in your backpack and use that option in addition to what your equipped weapon provides.

vessels.name: Warlock
vessels.rules: Warlock Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Pact Force Collect a pact token whenever you deal at least one wound with a melee attack (max. 6). You may spend 2 pact tokens to add (Power Die) to spellcasting - decide before rolling. Paraphernalia Whenever you or an ally within range 3 use a consumable item, you receive 3 pact tokens. Time Dilation Once per round, at any time, you may spend 2 pact tokens to reduce one of your cooldowns by 3. School of Decay Your spells that require to be treated like a ranged attack either cause Cripple or Weaken when dealing at least one wound. Combat Warlock When spending pact tokens, you may perform a free melee attack.

vessels.name: Warrior
vessels.rules: Warrior Move (1)  (gain Slippery) Primal Force Add (Blessing Die) to your attacks as long as you don't wear a shield. No Pain, No Gain Turn one (Cursed Die) you'd suffer from wounds into a (Blessing Die). Combat Tactics You can distribute and use your default movement points (resulting from your vessel's speed) freely throughout your turn. Reckless Strikes You may add (Power Die) to your attacks, but suffer a scratch in the process. Overpowering Advances If you just moved to get adjacent to an enemy, add +2 power if you attack them (only on the first attack after moving).

vessels.name: Witch
vessels.rules: Witch Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Tricking The Mind If an enemy would pick you as a target, you may choose one of your cards on cooldown 1 or 2 and increase it by +3 to be ignored. The enemy will try to find another target instead. Witchcraft After you or an ally has used an item of the type 'potion', roll (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die). If one shows a number, the item can be kept. Undaunted You become immune against the Cursed and Terror effects. Tap Life At the beginning of each round, declare an enemy. If that enemy dies during that round, heal one scratch from yourself. Sinister Omen At the beginning of each round, declare an ally. If that ally suffers at least 2 scratches or one wound from an enemy attack during that round, end the cooldown of one of your cards.

vessels.name: Wizard
vessels.rules: Wizard Reduce one of your cooldowns by 1 Arcane Studies You may add (Standard Die) to your spellcasting dice pool (decide before rolling). Astral Burst Add (Blessing Die) to your first spellcasting roll of each round. Quickweaving Your first used spell of each round has -1 cooldown. Ready Magick Once per round, you may spend (Star) (on any roll) to immediately play a spell from your hand. Infinite Wisdom Add any one spell (base level) to your hand cards (does not affect your card purchase costs). If you lose this vessel, that spell is lost as well.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.baseEffect: Add to attacks.

Blade.name: Blade
Blade.baseEffect: Add to attacks.

Polearm.name: Polearm
Polearm.baseEffect: Reach. Add to attacks.

Axe.name: Axe
Axe.baseEffect:
Add to attacks,
but to melee defense.

Staff.name: Staff
Staff.baseEffect: Add to spellcasting.

Wand.name: Wand
Wand.baseEffect: Add to attacks and spellcasting.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.baseEffect: Add to defense.

Light Armor.name: Light Armor
Light Armor.baseEffect: Once per round: Add to one of your attack or spellcasting rolls.

Medium Armor.name: Medium Armor
Medium Armor.baseEffect: Ignore the first scratch of each round.
